markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[Create Water](/Spells.aspx?ID=53)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 326 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 0 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

As you cup your hands, water begins to flow forth from them. You create 2 gallons of water. If no one drinks it, it evaporates after 1 day.
name: Create Water

text: Create Water Source Core Rulebook pg. 326 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Divine, Primal Spell Lists Elemental Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Range 0 feet --- As you cup your hands, water begins to flow forth from them. You create 2 gallons of water. If no one drinks it, it evaporates after 1 day.
